ai-tha-ap176:1.3_0: After giving alms food, and almsfood,
ai-tha-ap176:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap176:2.4_0: this fruit is made of water.
ai-tha-ap176:4.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Udaya.
ai-tha-ap176:5.1_0: for the fourth month (of Udaya), who was the fourth Elder,
